alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 25 at 2:18PM PST until December 27 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 55 to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast, Central Oregon Coast, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Oregon Coast; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; North Oregon Coast
